channel.title: Homes on Pouya Samangouei
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pouya Samangouei

item.description: Biography Got my Ph.D. at the University of Maryland, College Park, under supervision of Rama Chellappa. I worked on various computer vision and machine learning problems while doing my Ph.D.: attribute detection for mobile phones, face detection, compressed sensing with GANs, defending deep networks using GANs, and explaining black-box classifiers with GANs. Now a machine learning scientist at Butterfly Network working with Nathan Silberman to make medical imaging intelligent, cheap, and accessible.

item.title: News
item.description: Jul18: Officially Dr. Pouya Samangouei. Jul18: Explain-GAN is accepted in ECCV18 (link). Apr18: Defense-GAN code is released. Mar18: Face-Magnet code is released. Mar18: Face-MagNet paper is published in WACV18 and is on arxiv. Feb18: CSGAN code is released. Jan18: Happy to see the ICLR18 oral paper AmbientGAN is very related to Algorithm 2 of our AAAI18 paper. Jan18: DefenseGAN is accepted in ICLR18. Jan18: Started my spring research internship at Butterfly Network with Nathan Silberman.
